Package com.IAppDevelopment.virtual_marathon.Service

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LocationService
    This class produces a server that works in the background, To get data from the user's location even if the user is not in the app, She processes them and stops her work in the background, While the user is reaching the specified target distance or, If you choose to discontinue an activity proactively, The server code center works in a parallel process, Because of the load created.
    Service_notification
    The role of this department is to act as a local server that always operates in the background in order to listen to scheduled messages from the server, and to be a recovery mechanism for a situation where there is no reception to transfer data to the remote server
